name: Fight And Flight (Penguinmanereikel)
description:
!!! IMPORTANT !!!

If the .exe file gets blocked, try whitelisting it on your antivirus software (if it disappeared, unzip it again or try checking your quarantined files). Alternatively, if you have Python installed on your machine, just run the .py file directly!

You're lost in space with your AI-navigated ship deep in alien territory!

You need to escape to the exit portal, but your ship has limited power between weapons and navigation...

CONTROLS

Use Arrow Keys to move your gun and Spacebar to fire.

Use W and S to select a pair of modules (Damage/Direction, or Rotation/Speed)

Use A and D to shift power between selected modules.

Every 2 seconds, the AI will calculate a route and power will redistribute according to what you set. Be warned, the more power you take from navigation, the stupider the AI will get.

Modules

GUN DMG: More power = More damage to enemies
NAV DIR: More power = Better pathing to exitGUN ROT: More power = Gun rotates faster
NAV SPEED: More power = Ship moves closer to cruising speed


CREDITS

Code, Art, Concept: Penguinmanereikel

Music: 'Lightless Dawn' by Kevin McLeod (incompetech.com)

SFX: colorsCrimsonTears, timGormly, michael_grinnell, Wolfsinger, giddster, Jerimee, aldermanzk, jalastram (freesound.org)

Made for WOWIE Jame 4.0
